background: Employees of a company have the option to car-pool or take the company bus to work. Each car-pool and bus has different capacities and pollution outputs.
constraints: At least MinE employees need to be transported
At most MaxBuses buses can be used
objective: Minimize the total pollution produced by the transportation of employees
description: Employees have the option of car-pooling to work or taking the company bus. A car can take \param{C} employees and produces \param{Pc} units of pollution, while a bus can take \param{B} employees and produces \param{Pb} units of pollution. At least \param{MinE} employees need to be transported and at most \param{MaxBuses} buses can be used. How many of each type of transport should be taken to minimize the total pollution produced.

parameters.definition: Pollution units produced by one car
Pollution units produced by one bus
Minimum number of employees to be transported
Maximum number of buses to be used
